pkgmetadata.longdescription: Perform Global Vector Autoregression Estimation and Inference // Perform the estimation and inference of Global Vector Autoregression model (GVAR) of Pesaran, Schuermann and Weiner (2004) DOI:10.1198/073500104000000019 and Dees, di Mauro, Pesaran and Smith (2007) DOI:10.1002/jae.932.
